blogPost.excerpt: Compose private notes, optionally share them with others and still stay in control of who can access your data. All while having an excellent offline-first experience on all platforms.
blogPost.body: Compose private notes, optionally share them with others and still stay in control of who can access your data. All while having an excellent offline-first experience on all platforms.
blogPost.title: Serenity Notes - End-to-end encrypted collaborative notes app
blogPost.author: Moritz Plassnig

localize.description: 撰写私人笔记，有选择地与他人分享，并且仍然可以控制谁可以访问你的数据。同时在所有平台上都能获得出色的离线优先体验。
localize.tagline: 端到端加密的协作笔记应用。

localize.description: 撰寫私人筆記，有選擇地與他人分享，並且仍然可以控制誰可以訪問你的數據。同時在所有平臺上都能獲得出色的離線優先體驗。
localize.tagline: 端到端加密的協作筆記應用。
